Texts.Chs: 我现在只需要一个远古神器，这并不容易找到，然后是一个远古雕文，最后则是一个远古核心。接下来我只需要虔诚地祈祷。
Texts.Eng: I just need to set an Elder Artifact...not easy to find, I'll tell you that much! Then an Ancient Glyph and finally an Elder Core. Then I pray to the dark thing that shrine is dedicated to, and presto!

Texts.Chs: 我不应该这样做，但是我无法抗拒他。今日，我通过大量的试验终于得出了正确的组合。
Texts.Eng: I probably shouldn't have done that...but I couldn't resist. The Altar showed me how to do it, finally! I just needed the right combination, and through trial and error I've got it.

Texts.Chs: 我想我是不够虔诚，或者是念错了咒文，从今天早上开始，我正在慢慢地腐烂，就在刚才，我的脚趾脱落了。我想我死定了，如果你恰好看到了我所写的，并一定要尝试，请一定不要重蹈我的覆辙。
Texts.Eng: Tried the ritual. I think I said something wrong. I'm rotting, slowly but surely. My toe fell off this morning. So my other digits won't be far behind. If you try this, say the damned words right!
